mapper.select:
select userno, name, userid, nickname, gender, email, postcode, address, detailAddress, extraAddress, phone, gradeno FROM usertb
and userno = #{userno }
mapper.insert: insert into ACCESSHISTORY (ACCESSNO, USERNO, ACCESSDATE) VALUES (ACCESSHISTORY_SEQ.nextval, #{userNo}, sysdate + 9/24)
mapper.update:
update ACCESSHISTORY set ACCESSDATE = sysdate + 9/24
and userNo = #{userno}
mapper.select: select ACCESSNO, ACCESSDATE, u.NICKNAME, u.USERID from ACCESSHISTORY a left outer join USERTB U on U.USERNO = a.USERNO order by ACCESSDATE
